src:
【星宇K董點子王】K董發600張宇宙限量悠遊卡　星宇粉37分鐘內搶完
01 Nov 2019, 07:03 by 徐珍翔
星宇航空預計明（2020）年1月開航，目前既無法賣票，也沒有貨運等業務加持，本該零收入；不過，在網路上一票死忠粉絲的支持下，張國煒的點子再生奇效，短短37分鐘內，「宇宙限量600張」的A321neo悠遊卡就被搶購一空，硬生生變出數十萬的業績。
新機抵台不到4天，星宇航空臉書粉絲頁又有暴動，31日一則貼文寫道：「狂賀星宇航空首架A321neo 順利完成交機、返抵台灣！星宇小舖特別推出壓箱新品－A321neo交機紀念典藏版悠遊卡。感謝星宇粉近日陸空連線關注的目光，快下單慰勞這週鍵盤手的辛勞吧 ！」吸引七千多人按讚。
據悉，星宇航空明年1月23日才開航，在此之前還必須經過「適航驗證作業」，以及機場分配的「班機起降時間帶」等考驗，才能對外售票，原本可說是一家航空公司的零營收階段。
不過，星宇航空的做法向來新穎，自然不走常軌。


抓準首架飛機抵台時機，星宇航空推限量悠遊卡引起粉絲一陣搶購。（翻攝自星宇航空臉書）



抓準首架飛機抵台時機，星宇航空推限量悠遊卡引起粉絲一陣搶購。（翻攝自星宇航空臉書）

抓準首架客機抵台，話題正熱的時機，星宇航空推出A321neo悠遊卡，該卡售價雖達890元，不過，由於上面印著「1st」字樣，加上限量600張的誘惑，依舊在短短37分鐘內銷售一空，也讓人再次見識到張國煒的「鬼腦袋」，以及「星粉」死忠程度。
此外，星宇航空所經營的購物網站「星宇小舖」目前已上架13項周邊商品，除了旅行頸枕、手持風扇外，幾乎都是頗具設計感的文具用品，網站上瀰漫一股該公司為粉絲量身打造的「文青風格」心意。
更新時間｜2019.11.01 07:36
text:
[Xingyu K Dongzizi Wang]K Dongfa 600 universe limited edition leisure card Xingyu powder finished within 37 minutes
01 Nov 2019, 07:03 by Xu Zhenxiang
Xingyu Airlines is expected to start sailing in January (2020). At present, it is unable to sell tickets or cargo and other business blessings. It should have zero income. However, with the support of a loyal fan on the Internet, Zhang Guofan’s ideas are revived. In just 37 minutes, the A321neo leisure card with a limited edition of 600 in the universe was snapped up, and it was hard to make hundreds of thousands of achievements.
Less than 4 days after the arrival of the new machine, there was a riot in the Facebook page of Xingyu Airlines. On the 31st, a post wrote: "The first A321neo of the madness of Xingyu Airlines successfully completed the handover and returned to Taiwan! Xingyu shop launched The new product of the pressure box-A321neo commemorative collector's edition leisure card. Thanks to the attention of Xingyu powder in the recent land and air connection, please put down the hard work of the keyboard player this week!" Attracting more than 7,000 people.
It is reported that Xingyu Airlines will only sail on January 23 next year. Before that, it must pass the "airworthiness verification operation" and the "airplane take-off and landing time belt" allocated by the airport to be able to sell tickets. It could be said that it is an aviation. The company's zero revenue phase.
However, Xingyu’s approach has always been novel and naturally does not follow the norm.


Grasping the timing of the first aircraft to arrive at the stage, Xingyu Airlines pushed the limited number of leisure cards to cause fans to snap up. (Reflected from Xingyu Aviation Facebook)



Grasping the timing of the first aircraft to arrive at the stage, Xingyu Airlines pushed the limited number of leisure cards to cause fans to snap up. (Reflected from Xingyu Aviation Facebook)

When the first passenger plane arrived, the topic was hot. Xingyu Airlines launched the A321neo leisure card, which sold for 890 yuan. However, due to the "1st" printed on it, the temptation to add 600 pieces. Still sold out in just 37 minutes, it also makes people see Zhang Guofan's "Ghost Head" and "Star Powder" death loyalty.
In addition, Xingyu Aviation's shopping website "Xingyu Shop" has put on 13 items of surrounding goods. Apart from travel neck pillows and hand-held fans, it is almost a design stationery. The website is full of the company. The "Wen Qing style" mindset tailored for fans.
Update time|2019.11.01 07:36
